settings.help_text: Mattermost Personal Access Token for executing CreateEmoji API

settings_schema.footer:
* To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/kaakaa/mattermost-emojigen).
* * *
This plugin uses [**M+ Fonts**](https://mplus-fonts.osdn.jp/) for generating emojis, and **M+ Fonts** is [distributed under unlimited permission](https://mplus-fonts.osdn.jp/about-en.html#license).
